name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior JavaScript Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, **Vue.js**, and front-end technologies such as **HTML5** and **CSS3**. Proven track record in developing high-performance web applications and leading projects that leverage modern frameworks and libraries, including **ECMAScript5** and **ECMAScript6**. Strong expertise in utilizing build tools like **Webpack** and **Gulp** while adhering to Behavior-Driven Development principles. Proficient in version control with **Git** and CSS preprocessors like **LESS** and **SASS**. Experienced in building secure and compliant solutions, with particular attention to ensuring best practices in code quality and maintainability. Prior experience in cloud-native applications using frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**, and foundational knowledge of MLOps tools including **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Passionate about creating impactful solutions that enhance user experiences.
